arm_group.description: Treatment with investigational method (virtual implant positioning system)
Treatment with surgical standard of care

brief_summary.textblock:
This study is a randomized, controlled, 2-arm, open trial to evaluate an innovative
      positioning system in the clinical setting of orthopedic surgery.

      Aim of the study is the validation and comparison of the innovative medical device with the
      current standard method.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of an Innovative Medical Device Supporting Orthopedic Surgical Interventions
clinical_study.condition: Fracture of Distal End of Radius

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients with diastal fracture of the radius

          -  Patients with the mentioned fracture and indication for surgical treatment  according
             to national guidelines

          -  Age >/= 18 years of age

          -  Patients willing to participate and after having given their informed consent in
             written form

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Participation in other interventional clinical trials

          -  Pregnant or lactating women

intervention.intervention_name: Treatment with investigational method (virtual implant positioning system)
Treatment with surgical standard of care

clinical_study.official_title: Virtual Implant Planning System - A Method to Support Image-guided Surgical Interventions

oversight_info.authority: Germany: Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices

primary_outcome.description: The number of screw replacements in both treatment arms will be assessed to evaluate the investigational method in comparison to the standard of care (arm B)
primary_outcome.measure: Number of screw replacements in both treatments arms
primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of the hospital stay, an expected average of 3 days

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: Comparison of the investigational method to the standard of care regarding radiation time.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of the hospital stay, an expected average of 3 days

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of adverse events and serious adverse events during the clinical investigarion.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of the hospital stay, an expected average of 3 days

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
